mapper.select: select rn, r_no, r_da_no, r_id,r_title,r_txt, r_date from (select Rownum as rn,r_no, r_da_no, r_id,r_title,r_txt, r_date from (select r_no, r_da_no, r_id,r_title,r_txt, r_date from review_table order by r_date desc)) where RN between #{r_da_no} and #{r_no}
mapper.delete: delete from review_table where r_no = #{r_no} and r_id = #{r_id}
